description: {{OVERRIDE}}**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
First, please enter your time zone. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-need-my-timezone)
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker](${Config.links.map})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone. You can then enter it below.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!
{{OVERRIDE}}**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.
Please enter your birth month and day. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#why-does-birthday-bot-only-need-my-birth-month-and-date)
**Example Usage:** `08/28` (MM/DD)
**Info**: Birthdays are stored globally, meaning you only have to set your birthday once!

defaultTimeZoneAvailable.description: This server has a default timezone of **{{TIMEZONE}}**, do you want to use this timezone?

inputPage.description: Please input the page you would like to jump to:

confirmFirstBirthday.description: {{TARGET}}, please confirm this information is correct: **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**

confirmChangeBirthday.description: {{TARGET}}, your birthday is already set, please confirm this information is correct to change it: **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**

birthdayExpired.title: Birthday Set - Expired
birthdayExpired.description: Type `bday set` to rerun the birthday setup.

outOfAttempts.description: You are out of birthday attempts!

memberNeedsMessageHistory.description: {{MEMBER}} needs the `READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY` permission in this channel!

cantSuggest.description: You do not have permission to suggest birthdays for other users!

cantSetTimeZoneForBot.description: You can't set a birthday for a bot!

invalidTimeZoneAbbreviation.description: Invalid time zone! Do not use timezone abbreviations!

invalidMessageType.title: Custom Message List
invalidMessageType.description: Please specify a message type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`

cantSetForBot.description: You can't set a birthday for a bot!

serverOnlyCommand.title: Server Only Command!
serverOnlyCommand.description: This command can only be used in a server.

footer.text: Please try again in a server!

permissionRequired.title: Permission Required!
permissionRequired.description: You don't have permission to run that command!

birthday.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *Birthdays are celebrated on the day (and __time zone__) of the birthday user. To set your birthday use `bday set`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

customMessageFree.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *A random {{TYPE}} message is chosen for each {{TYPE}}. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-custom-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

customMessagePremium.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *A random {{TYPE}} message is chosen for each {{TYPE}}. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-custom-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

customUserMessageFree.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-user-specific-birthday-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

customUserMessagePremium.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-user-specific-birthday-message)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRoleFree.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `bday config` [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-trusted-role)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRolePremium.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `bday config` [(?)](${Config.links.docs}/faq#what-is-a-trusted-role)*
{{LIST_DATA}}

blacklist.title: {{REF:list.listTitle}}
description: *Users on this list will not have their birthdays celebrated no matter what. Edit this list with `bday blacklist <add/remove> <User>`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

general.botDescription: {{REF:links.linkTemplateEmbed}} helps your server track and celebrate birthdays by automatically celebrating them with numerous fun and extremely customizable features.

links.linkSupportEmbed: For support join our discord server [here]({{REF:links.linkSupport}})!

footers.tryAgainFooter: Please check above and try again!
footers.attemptsFooter: You now have {{AMOUNT}} birthday attempts left.
footers.useAttemptFooter: You have {{CHANGES_LEFT}} attempts left. By clicking confirm you will use one of them.
footers.useAttemptForTargetFooter: {{TARGET}} has {{CHANGES_LEFT}} attempts left. By clicking confirm they will use one of them.

prompts.birthdayOverride: __**Note**__: Your birthday is already set, continue to change it.

list.messageListPremiumFieldText: The free version of Birthday Bot can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom {{TYPE}} messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `bday premium`!
list.userBirthdayMessageListFieldText: User-specific messages are a premium only feature. Unlock them with `bday premium`!
list.trustedRoleListFieldText: The free version of Birthday Bot can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE_TRUSTED_ROLES}}** trusted roles. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID_TRUSTED_ROLES}}** with `bday premium`!

missingEmbedPerms: I don't have all permissions required to send messages here!
Please allow me to **Read Messages**, **Send Messages**, **Embed Links**, and **Add Reactions** in this channel.
